results.title: Increased ratio of P[v-a]CO2 to C[a-v]O2 without global hypoxia: the case of metformin-induced lactic acidosis.
results.text_hl: Twelve anaesthetised, mechanically ventilated @SPECIES_9823 @@@pigs@@@ were @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholic_Intoxication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000435 @@@intoxicated@@@ with IV @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (4.0 to 6.4 g over 2.5 to 4.0 h).

citations.NLM: Andreis DT, Mallat J, Tettamanti M, Chiarla C, Giovannini I, Gatti S, Protti A. Increased ratio of P[v-a]CO2 to C[a-v]O2 without global hypoxia: the case of metformin-induced lactic acidosis. Respir Physiol Neurobiol. 2021 Mar;285():103586. PMID: 33202296
citations.BibTeX: @article{33202296, title={Increased ratio of P[v-a]CO2 to C[a-v]O2 without global hypoxia: the case of metformin-induced lactic acidosis.}, author={Andreis DT and Mallat J and Tettamanti M and Chiarla C and Giovannini I and Gatti S and Protti A}, journal={Respir Physiol Neurobiol}, volume={285}, pages={103586}}

results.title: [Severe lactic acidosis due to metformin therapy in a patient with contra-indications for metformin].
results.text_hl: This was due to a severe @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ caused by acute @<m>DISEASE_Alcoholic_Intoxication</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000435 @@@alcohol intoxication@@@ and the use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Houwerzijl EJ, Snoek WJ, van Haastert M, Holman ND. [Severe lactic acidosis due to metformin therapy in a patient with contra-indications for metformin]. Ned Tijdschr Geneeskd. 2000 Sep 30;144(40):1923-6. PMID: 11045142
